Class SlashAutoPublish

Contains slash commands for managing auto-publish settings in announcement channels.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Utility
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("autopublish", "Auto publish stuff in announcement channels!")]
public class SlashAutoPublish : MewdekoSlashSubmodule<AutoPublishService>, IInteractionModuleBase

SlashAutoPublish(InteractiveService)

Contains slash commands for managing auto-publish settings in announcement channels.

public SlashAutoPublish(InteractiveService interactiveService)

Type Name Description
InteractiveService interactiveService

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AddAutoPublish(INewsChannel)

Adds a channel to the list of channels where messages are auto-published. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("add", "Adds a channel to be used with auto publish", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AddAutoPublish(INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
INewsChannel channel

The news channel to be added for auto-publishing.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding a channel to auto-publish.
| Edit this page View Source

AddPublishBlacklist(IUser, INewsChannel)

Blacklists a user from having their messages auto-published in a specified channel. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("blacklist-user", "Blacklist a user from getting their message auto published", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AddPublishBlacklist(IUser user, INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user to be blacklisted.
INewsChannel channel

The news channel from which the user is blacklisted.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding a user to the blacklist.
| Edit this page View Source

AddPublishBlacklist(string, INewsChannel)

Blacklists a word, preventing messages containing this word from being auto-published in a specified channel. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("blacklist-word", "Blacklist a word to stop a message containing this word getting auto published", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AddPublishBlacklist(string word, INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string word

The word to be blacklisted.
INewsChannel channel

The news channel where the word is to be blacklisted.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding a word to the blacklist.
| Edit this page View Source

GetAutoPublishes()

Lists all channels and settings related to auto-publishing. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("list", "Lists all auto publish channels and settings", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task GetAutoPublishes()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of listing all auto-publish channels and settings.
| Edit this page View Source

RemoveAutoPublish(INewsChannel)

Removes a channel from the list of auto-publish channels. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("remove", "Removes a channel from auto publish", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task RemoveAutoPublish(INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
INewsChannel channel

The news channel to be removed from auto-publishing.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of removing a channel from auto-publish.
| Edit this page View Source

RemovePublishBlacklist(IUser, INewsChannel)

Removes a user from the blacklist, allowing their messages to be auto-published again in a specified channel. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("unblacklist-user", "Removes a user from the blacklist", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task RemovePublishBlacklist(IUser user, INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user to be removed from the blacklist.
INewsChannel channel

The news channel from which the user is removed.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of removing a user from the blacklist.
| Edit this page View Source

RemovePublishBlacklist(string, INewsChannel)

Removes a word from the blacklist, allowing messages containing this word to be auto-published again in a specified channel. Requires the command invoker to have Administrator permissions in the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("unblacklist-word", "Removes a word from the blacklist", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task RemovePublishBlacklist(string word, INewsChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string word

The word to be removed from the blacklist.
INewsChannel channel

The news channel from which the word is removed.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of removing a word from the blacklist.
